dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT :START_DATE from_dt, :END_DATE to_dt, (CASE WHEN :LOCS IS NULL THEN 'ALL' ELSE :LOCS END) loc_codes FROM DUAL

SELECT oref1.ob_refnum_value loc, oob.order_base_xid contract_no, oref2.ob_refnum_value commodity, con.contact_xid customer_id, loc.country_code3_gid contract_country, ROUND(oline.weight_base / 2204.5855379,2) contract_quantity, ROUND((oline.weight_base / 2204.5855379) - NVL((SELECT SUM(wt.weight) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid, ((CASE WHEN ssu1.tag_3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ssu1.unit_net_weight_base END) / 2204.5855379) weight FROM s_ship_unit_line ssul1 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu1 ON ssu1.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssul1.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid) wt),0),2) unshipped_quantity, TO_CHAR(oline.early_pickup_date,'MM-DD-YYYY') ship_start, TO_CHAR(oline.late_delivery_date,'MM-DD-YYYY') ship_end, (CASE WHEN oref3.ob_refnum_value IS NULL THEN 'OPEN' ELSE oref3.ob_refnum_value END) contract_status FROM ob_order_base oob INNER JOIN ob_line oline ON oob.order_base_gid = oline.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref3 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref3.order_base_gid AND oref3.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CLOSE/REOPEN' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_involved_party obip ON oob.order_base_gid = obip.order_base_gid AND obip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con ON obip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc ON oline.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE oob.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND oob.order_base_xid LIKE 'S%' AND (TO_DATE(oline.early_pickup_date,'DD-MM-RR') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(oline.early_pickup_date,'DD-MM-RR') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (:LOCS IS NULL OR (NOT :LOCS IS NULL AND oref1.ob_refnum_value IN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(xt.column_value) FROM XMLTABLE(LTRIM(RTRIM(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(:LOCS,'[^[:digit:]]+', ','),'^,+|,+$'), ','), ',')) xt))) ORDER BY oline.early_pickup_date DESC
